item.title: Back to Black
item.description:
Lately, I’ve been noticing there are more and more black strands among my now almost completely grey hair. I never asked anyone else’s opinion about it simply because my impression was that’s just my imagination. That all changed yesterday…

Yesterday, in my monthly routine haircut, as soon as my barber who is a very sharp (mentally and instrumentally) Asian lady started to trim my hair, completely to my surprise, asked me if I have noticed my hair is backing to black cause she can tell for sure it is! ðŸ˜²
